channel.title: pgsql on Chaos is order not yet deciphered

item.title: Sysbench for databases
item.description: This is my second part of the sysbench guide, I’ll cover here some basic benchmarks for databases. Feel free to check my first part for an introduction. Connecting to the DB ðŸ”—First things first, we’ll need a test database. We’ll stick to the default “sbtest”, so go ahead and create it. I’ll wait. Now sysbench needs the connection parameters. The actual values depend on the target. Sysbench supports MySQL and postgreSQL.
